actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to terminate the District of Columbia's borrowing authority from the U.S. Treasury for the metropolitan area sanitary sewage works fund.

summary.text: Repeals the authority of the Secretary of the Treasury to make loans to the District of Columbia to construct and maintain a sanitary sewer system connecting Dulles International Airport with the District of Columbia system.

titles.title: A bill to terminate the District of Columbia's borrowing authority from the U.S. Treasury for the metropolitan area sanitary sewage works fund.
